prompt: <description>**Part 1** *Shape Detail* Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top. The dimensions of the prism are approximately 0.75 units by 0.75 units by 0.75 units. *Instructions* 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0°, 0°, -90°] - Translation Vector: [0, 0.75, 0] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the newly created coordinate system. 3. The sketch should contain a single face (face_1) with a loop (loop_1) that is made up of the following lines: - Line 1: Starting point at [0,0], ending point at [0.75, 0] - Line 2: Starting point at [0.75, 0], ending point at [0.75, 0.75] - Line 3: Starting point at [0.75, 0.75], ending point at [0, 0.75] - Line 4: Starting point at [0, 0.75], ending point at [0, 0] 4. Scale the 2D sketch uniformly by a factor of 0.75. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis to generate the 3D model with a depth of 0.75 units. **Part 2** *Shape Detail* Construct a modified three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom where the sides are parallel and meet at right angles. The dimensions of the prism are approximately 2 units by 3 units by 4 units after removal of a portion. *Instructions* 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0°, 0°, 0°] - Translation Vector: [0.375, 0.375, 0.75] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the newly created coordinate system. 3. The sketch should contain a single face (face_1) with a loop (loop_1) that is made up of the following lines: - Line 1: Starting point at [0,0], ending point at [0.375, 0] - Line 2: Starting point at [0.375, 0], ending point at [0.375, 0.375] - Line 3: Starting point at [0.375, 0.375], ending point at [0, 0.375] - Line 4: Starting point at [0, 0.375], ending point at [0, 0] 4. Do not scale the 2D sketch. 5. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the negative Z-axis to generate a 3D model with a depth of 0.375 units, thus removing a portion of the prism.</description>
